p: As of June 1 st, 2020, 284 (95.6 %) patients had recovered and discharged from Guangzhou Eighth Peopleâ€™s hospital, one (0.3 %) 82-year-old patient died of multiple organ failure even though receiving ECMO treatment, twelve (4.0 %) patients were transferred to the designated hospital for critically ill patients in Guangzhou due to the deterioration of their illness within 8 days (IQR, 5-18) after admission ( Table 2).
